content: every dog deserves to be a bit fancy whether for a glamorous night on the town or fun day at the dog park your best friend will be the most stylish pooch around with this super cute bow tie the smallest tie is also perfect for fancy cats as well this simple pattern is knit in the round starting with judy s magic cast on and ending with kitchener stitch a purl stitch on each edge helps the tie lay flat this pattern is intended to be worn on a dog s collar the i-cord acts to cinch the piece into its bow tie shape and doubles as a loop to thread onto the collar the i-cord can be adjusted to fit larger or smaller collars
